name: AMEBA (Pablo Lario)
description:
AMEBA is a casual real time puzzle game in which you have to stop a dangerous infection from spreading to the rest of the body. Your mission is simple: defend the different organs that compose the human body. 

My name is Pablo Lario, and I am the developer of AMEBA. I hope you enjoy the game. In case you want to find out other projects and games I have made, please, check out my social media and itch.io page. Hope you find them interesting!
